QuestData.Title: Into the Heart of the Labyrinth
QuestData.Description: The Shadow Council has lost control of the cosmic being that they summoned here almost two years ago.$B$BKnown only as Murmur, it threatens to overrun the Shadow Council and break free into the outside world!
QuestData.LogDescription: Destroy Murmur and inform Field Commander Mahfuun inside the Shadow Labyrinth of Auchindoun.
QuestData.RewardText: I cringe to think what would have happened had Murmur escaped to the outside world.$B$BThank you, brave hero.
